name: Mr. TV in "Short Circuit"!
description:
Mr. TV lives in an old television with a fried motherboard. Join him in a nail biting adventure and help avoid any colorful obstacles that are out to get our old fashioned Mr. TV!

Enemies include Board Chips, Spikes, a Broken Heart, Neutron Balls, Lasers, Homing Missile USB's, Drapes, Rotating Gears & Walking Angry Flames!

Controls: [Controller Required]

Movement - Left Analog Stick

Jump - A Button

Cover from Lasers (Unlocked) - Hold Right Bumper
